lead_paragraph: The Alliance of Automobile Manufacturers says “government policy must focus on market realities,” while the E.P.A. touts fuel-efficiency successes.

headline.print_headline: Are U.S. Fuel Economy Standards Working?
headline.main: Are U.S. Fuel Economy Standards Working?

snippet: The Alliance of Automobile Manufacturers says “government policy must focus on market realities,” while the E.P.A. touts fuel-efficiency successes.
